mode.name: Border color mode
mode.hint: Use Foundry disposition colors, a custom color, or colors based on health condition.

customColor.name: Outline Color
customColor.hint: Used only when Color mode is Custom and Outline is enabled. Default: #88ccff

targetColor.name: Target Outline Color
targetColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom and Target Outline is enabled. Sets the border color for the targeted token. Default: #88ccff

glowColor.name: Glow Color
glowColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom and Glow is enabled. Sets the color of the border glow. Default: #88ccff

targetGlowColor.name: Target Glow Color
targetGlowColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom, Target Glow is enabled. Sets the glow color for targeted tokens. Default: #88ccff

hideDefaultBorder.name: Hide Default Foundry Border
hideDefaultBorder.hint: Hide Foundryâ€™s built-in selection border on tokens.

enableTarget.name: Enable Target Outline
enableTarget.hint: Also show the outline and glow on tokens you target.

enableGlow.name: Enable glow
enableGlow.hint: If enabled, tokens will also get a soft glow around them.

enableOutline.name: Enable outline
enableOutline.hint: If enabled, tokens will have a solid outline around them.

glowDistance.name: Glow distance
glowDistance.hint: Glow radius in pixels. Larger values expand the glow outward.

glowOuterStrength.name: Glow outer strength
glowOuterStrength.hint: Intensity of the outer glow. Higher values are brighter.
